setAuthenticator(RMIAuthenticator) - Method in class agilermi.core.RMIRegistry.Builder
Set an RMIAuthenticator object that intercept authentication and authorization requests from remote machines.
setClassLoaderFactory(ClassLoaderFactory) - Method in class agilermi.core.RMIRegistry.Builder
Set the class loader factory used by this registry to decode remote classes when code mobility is enabled.
setCodeMobilityEnabled(boolean) - Method in class agilermi.core.RMIRegistry
Set the code mobility enable flag.
setDefaultAuthorization(boolean) - Method in class agilermi.authentication.StandardRMIAuthenticator
Sets the default authorization, that is the default return value of the StandardRMIAuthenticator.authorize(String, Object, Method) method when no criterion has been found
setDgcLeaseValue(int) - Method in class agilermi.core.RMIRegistry.Builder
Sets the lease timeout after that the distributed garbage collection mechanism will remove a non-named object from the registry.

Sets the lease timeout after that the distributed garbage collection mechanism will remove a non-named object from the registry.
